com.mesosphere.sdk.state

Class ConfigStore<T extends Configuration>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.state.ConfigStore<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The Configuration object to be serialized and deserialized in the implementation of this interface
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigTargetStore

    public class ConfigStore<T extends Configuration>
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConfigTargetStore
    An implementation of ConfigStore which relies on the provided Persister for data persistence.

    The ZNode structure in Zookeeper is as follows:
    namespacedPath/ ("Services/NAMESPACE/" or "/")
      ConfigTarget (contains UUID)
      Configurations/
        UUID-0 (contains serialized config)
        UUID-1 (contains serialized config)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConfigStore(ConfigurationFactory<T> factory, Persister persister)
      Creates a new ConfigStore which uses the provided Persister to access configuration data within the root namespace.
      ConfigStore(ConfigurationFactory<T> factory, Persister persister, java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> namespace)
      Creates a new ConfigStore which uses the provided Persister to access configuration data within the provided namespace.

      Deletes the configuration with the provided UUID, or does nothing if no matching configuration is found.

      Retrieves and deserializes the Configuration assigned to the provided UUID, or throws an exception if no config with the provided UUID was found.

      Returns the current ID of the active target configuration, or throws an exception if none is set.

      Indicates whether the provided key is present in the store.

      Overrides the configuration factory which was provided in the constructor.

      Stores the ID of the active target configuration, replacing any current value.

      Serializes the provided Configuration using its Configuration.getBytes() function, writes it to storage, and returns the UUID which it was stored against.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConfigStore

        public ConfigStore(ConfigurationFactory<T> factory,
                   Persister persister)
        Creates a new ConfigStore which uses the provided Persister to access configuration data within the root namespace.
        Parameters:
        factory - The factory used to convert raw bytes to config objects of type T
        persister - The persister which holds the config data

      • ConfigStore

        public ConfigStore(ConfigurationFactory<T> factory,
                   Persister persister,
                   java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> namespace)
        Creates a new ConfigStore which uses the provided Persister to access configuration data within the provided namespace.
        Parameters:
        factory - The factory used to convert raw bytes to config objects of type T
        persister - The persister which holds the config data
        namespace - The namespace for data to be stored within, or an empty Optional for no namespacing

      • store

        public java.util.UUID store(T config)
                     throws ConfigStoreException
        Serializes the provided Configuration using its Configuration.getBytes() function, writes it to storage, and returns the UUID which it was stored against.
        Throws:
        ConfigStoreException - if serialization or writing fails

      • store

        public void store(java.util.UUID id,
                  T config)
           throws ConfigStoreException
        Serializes the provided Configuration using its Configuration.getBytes() function, writes it to storage with the provided ID as a key.
        Throws:
        ConfigStoreException - is serialization or writing fails

      • fetch

        public T fetch(java.util.UUID id)
        throws ConfigStoreException
        Retrieves and deserializes the Configuration assigned to the provided UUID, or throws an exception if no config with the provided UUID was found.
        Parameters:
        id - The UUID of the configuration to be fetched
        Returns:
        The deserialized configuration
        Throws:
        ConfigStoreException - if retrieval or deserialization fails, or if the requested config is missing

      • clear

        public void clear(java.util.UUID id)
           throws ConfigStoreException
        Deletes the configuration with the provided UUID, or does nothing if no matching configuration is found.
        Parameters:
        id - The UUID of the configuration to be deleted
        Throws:
        ConfigStoreException - if the configuration is found but deletion fails

      • list

        public java.util.Collection<java.util.UUID> list()
                                          throws ConfigStoreException
        Returns a list of all stored configuration UUIDs, or an empty list if none are found.
        Throws:
        ConfigStoreException - if list retrieval fails

        public java.util.UUID getTargetConfig()
                               throws ConfigStoreException
